title: MEGA International Appoints Sébastien Rey as Vice President of Latin America
text:
Technology veteran will oversee all operations
BOSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- MEGA International has appointed Sébastien Rey as vice president and managing director of the company’s rapidly growing Latin America business.
Rey has over 17 years of experience in technology and will now manage MEGA’s operations in Mexico, Central America, and South America. He will oversee sales, marketing, consulting, and partnership development from the company’s Mexico City office.
“Sébastien has an incredibly extensive knowledge of MEGA, our products and services, and how to expand the business,” remarked Lucio de Risi, CEO of MEGA. “This new opportunity managing Central and South America will give Sébastien the chance to share his expertise with colleagues and customers in that region and provide added value to those we serve.”
Previously, Rey served as MEGA’s group general counsel and prior to that, as MEGA’s corporate legal manager. Rey holds a Master’s degree in business and taxation from the National Conservatory of Arts and Trades of Paris, and another Master’s degree in business law from the University of Versailles. Rey is a member of the Mexican Bar Association (INCAM).
Rey is thrilled about his new position with MEGA’s Mexico City office and is looking forward to strengthening MEGA’s relationships in the region and developing new ones. “Enterprise architecture plays a key role in digital business transformation, customer experience excellence, and governance, risk, and compliance. I’m looking forward to serving our customers in this growing, fast-paced region and helping them achieve their business goals. This is an exciting time to be part of MEGA’s growth as we’re seeing an increase in organizations adapting and embracing new technologies to meet business demands.”
About MEGA
MEGA International is a global software firm helping companies manage enterprise complexity by giving them an interactive view of their operations. Executives gain the visibility and information they need to make the right choices for effective governance and to strike the right balance between capacity for innovation, cost optimization, and risk management. MEGA’s HOPEX software is a comprehensive lineup of integrated software bringing together industry-leading practices in enterprise architecture (EA), IT portfolio management (ITPM), business process analysis (BPA), and governance, risk, and compliance (GRC) into a single platform. Backed by HOPEX software and MEGA services, companies can boost business and IT agility in today’s disruptive business environment. www.mega.com
